axepick:
Axe here! Use left click on the cards to search and right click on the arrows to pick.
Choose 5 heroes now!
axeheroes:
Each player has to choose a team of
five heroes.
axemaxcards:
The maximum cards
that a player can have in his hand is equal to
the heroes mana sum divided by two. (Mana/2)
axecardsperturn:
The numbers of
skill cards per turn is equal to one plus the heroes mana sum divided by ten.
1 + (Mana/10)
axeautodeck: In a normal match, if you don't pick your team until the timer expires, random heroes will be selected for you
axeselectenemy: The objective is to destroy the enemy tower. Use left click to select. Select one of the enemy heroes now.
axezoom:
Well done!
Selected cards will appear on the right side.
Move your mouse over
to make it even bigger.
axeselectplayer: Use left click to select one of your heroes now.
axemove: Use right click on the green arrows to move your hero.
axewait: After moving, atacking ou casting a skill, your hero needs to wait for the next turn.
axedone: Your turn is over, wait for end of the enemy turn
axetime: You need to pay attention to both turns and time
axeenemymove:
Your enemy moved,
It's your turn now.
To battle!
axeattack: Select one of your heroes close to the enemy and use right click on a red arrow to attack.
axeskillselect: Great job! Your skill cards are picked at the beginning of yout turn. Use left click to select a skill.
axeskill: Use right click on a blue arrow to cast a skill. Passive skills do not end the hero turn.
axeend: Ah! Your did it, now you are ready for a real battle.
choosefriend: Coming soon - Search for a friend to play
choosebot: Coming soon - Play with against the computer
noenemy: Sorry but we could not find an opponent
pickdeck: Pick your deck, game starts in
